properties.help: Authentication for remote access L2TP VPN
Local user authentication for PPPoE server
Authentication mode used by this server

valueHelp.description: Use RADIUS server for user autentication

properties.help: Authentication protocol for remote access peer

valueHelp.description: Authentication via CHAP (Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol)
Authentication via MS-CHAP (Microsoft Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol)
Authentication via MS-CHAPv2 (Microsoft Challenge Handshake Authentication Protocol, version 2)

properties.help: IPv4 source address used to initiate connection

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Password must be less then 128 characters
Port number must be in range 1 to 65535

properties.help: Interval in seconds to send accounting information

valueHelp.description: Interval in seconds to send accounting information

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Interval value must be between 1 and 3600 seconds

properties.help: Maximum jitter value in seconds to be applied to accounting information interval
properties.constraintErrorMessage: Jitter value must be between 1 and 60 seconds

properties.help: Mark server unavailable for <n> seconds on failure
properties.constraintErrorMessage: Fail time must be between 0 and 600 seconds

properties.help: Timeout in seconds to wait response from RADIUS server
properties.constraintErrorMessage: Timeout must be between 1 and 60 seconds

properties.help: Timeout for Interim-Update packets, terminate session afterwards

valueHelp.description: Timeout in seconds, 0 to keep active

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Timeout must be between 0 and 60 seconds

properties.help: Number of tries to send Access-Request/Accounting-Request queries
properties.constraintErrorMessage: Maximum tries must be between 1 and 20

properties.help: Dynamic Authorization Extension/Change of Authorization server
IP address for Dynamic Authorization Extension server (DM/CoA)

valueHelp.description: IPv4 address for aynamic authorization server

properties.help: Port for Dynamic Authorization Extension server (DM/CoA)
Shared secret for Dynamic Authorization Extension server
RADIUS attribute that contains rate information

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Multiplier needs to be between 0.001 and 1000

properties.help: Internet Protocol Security (IPsec) for remote access L2TP VPN

valueHelp.description: Use pre-shared secret for IPsec authentication
Use X.509 certificate for IPsec authentication
Name of certificate in PKI configuration
Passphrase to decrypt the private key
Name of CA in PKI configuration

properties.help: Tunnel password used to authenticate the client (LAC)
Sent to the client (LAC) in the Host-Name attribute
properties.constraintErrorMessage: Host-name must be alphanumeric and can contain hyphens

properties.help: External IP address to which VPN clients will connect
Pool of addresses used to assign to clients
Prefix length used for individual client
Subnet used to delegate prefix through DHCPv6-PD (RFC3633)
Script to run before session interface comes up
Script to run when session interface is completely configured and started
Script to run when session interface going to terminate
Script to run when session interface changed by RADIUS CoA handling

valueHelp.description: Default Gateway send to the client

properties.help: Limits the connection rate from a single source
Maximum number of concurrent session start attempts

valueHelp.description: Maximum number of concurrent session start attempts

properties.constraintErrorMessage: Maximum concurent sessions must be in range 0-65535

valueHelp.description: send mppe request, if client rejects, drop the connection
send mppe request, if client rejects continue

properties.help: Maximum number of Echo-Requests may be sent without valid reply
Timeout in seconds to wait for any peer activity. If this option specified it turns on adaptive lcp echo functionality and "lcp-echo-failure" is not used.

valueHelp.description: Count of interfaces to keep in cache
Negotiate IPv4 only if client requests
Ask client for IPv4 negotiation, do not fail if it rejects
Negotiate IPv6 only if client requests
Ask client for IPv6 negotiation, do not fail if it rejects

properties.help: Fixed or random interface identifier for IPv6

valueHelp.description: Use a random interface identifier for IPv6
Calculate interface identifier from IPv4 address, for example 192:168:0:1

properties.help: Firewall mark value for traffic that excludes from shaping
Windows Internet Name Service (WINS) servers propagated to client
